title: Solar Airplane To Attempt Risky Flight Over The Pacific
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to Andr√© Borschberg, one of 2 Solar Impulse pilots. The plane will attempt a 5-day trans-Pacific flight from Nanjing, China, to Hawaii, as part of a round-the-world journey.
